info.title: DataLakeAnalyticsAccountManagementClient
info.description: Creates an Azure Data Lake Analytics account management client.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified compute policy. During update, the compute policy with the specified name will be replaced with this new compute policy. An account supports, at most, 50 policies

parameters.name: computePolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the compute policy to create or update.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update the compute policy. The max degree of parallelism per job property, min priority per job property, or both must be present.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the specified compute policy

SubResource.description: The resource model definition for a nested resource.

properties.description: The properties defined by Data Lake Analytics all properties are specific to each resource provider.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccount.description: A Data Lake Analytics account object, containing all information associated with the named Data Lake Analytics account.

properties.description: The properties defined by Data Lake Analytics all properties are specific to each resource provider.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountBasic.description: A Data Lake Analytics account object, containing all information associated with the named Data Lake Analytics account.

defaultDataLakeStoreAccount.description: The default Data Lake Store account associated with this account.

dataLakeStoreAccounts.description: The list of Data Lake Store accounts associated with this account.

storageAccounts.description: The list of Azure Blob Storage accounts associated with this account.

computePolicies.description: The list of compute policies associated with this account.

firewallRules.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this account.

firewallState.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this account.

firewallAllowAzureIps.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within Azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

newTier.description: The commitment tier for the next month.

currentTier.description: The commitment tier in use for the current month.

maxJobCount.description: The maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time.

systemMaxJobCount.description: The system defined maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time, which restricts the maximum number of running jobs the user can set for the account.

maxDegreeOfParallelism.description: The maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account.

systemMaxDegreeOfParallelism.description: The system defined maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account, which restricts the maximum value of parallelism the user can set for the account.

maxDegreeOfParallelismPerJob.description: The maximum supported degree of parallelism per job for this account.

minPriorityPerJob.description: The minimum supported priority per job for this account.

queryStoreRetention.description: The number of days that job metadata is retained.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountProperties.description: The account specific properties that are associated with an underlying Data Lake Analytics account. Returned only when retrieving a specific account.

accountId.description: The unique identifier associated with this Data Lake Analytics account.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the Data Lake Analytics account.

state.description: The state of the Data Lake Analytics account.

endpoint.description: The full CName endpoint for this account.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountPropertiesBasic.description: The basic account specific properties that are associated with an underlying Data Lake Analytics account.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountListResult.description: Data Lake Analytics account list information.

properties.description: The Data Lake Store account properties.

suffix.description: The optional suffix for the Data Lake Store account.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

DataLakeStoreAccountInformationListResul.description: Data Lake Store account list information.

properties.description: The Azure Storage account properties.

suffix.description: The optional suffix for the storage account.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

properties.description: The properties of the blob container.

lastModifiedTime.description: The last modified time of the blob container.

StorageContainerProperties.description: Azure Storage blob container properties information.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

StorageContainerListResult.description: The list of blob containers associated with the storage account attached to the Data Lake Analytics account.

accessToken.description: The access token for the associated Azure Storage Container.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

SasTokenInformationListResult.description: The SAS response that contains the storage account, container and associated SAS token for connection use.

properties.description: The compute policy properties.

ComputePolicy.description: Data Lake Analytics compute policy information.

objectId.description: The AAD object identifier for the entity to create a policy for.

objectType.description: The type of AAD object the object identifier refers to.

maxDegreeOfParallelismPerJob.description: The maximum degree of parallelism per job this user can use to submit jobs.

minPriorityPerJob.description: The minimum priority per job this user can use to submit jobs.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

ComputePolicyListResult.description: The list of compute policies in the account.

properties.description: The firewall rule properties.

FirewallRule.description: Data Lake Analytics firewall rule information.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

FirewallRuleListResult.description: Data Lake Analytics firewall rule list information.

display.description: The display information for the operation.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

Operation.description: An available operation for Data Lake Analytics.

provider.description: The resource provider of the operation.

resource.description: The resource type of the operation.

operation.description: A friendly name of the operation.

description.description: A friendly description of the operation.

OperationDisplay.description: The display information for a particular operation.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription credentials that uniquely identifies the subscription.

maxAccountCount.description: The maximum supported number of accounts under this subscription.

accountCount.description: The current number of accounts under this subscription.

migrationState.description: The Boolean value of true or false to indicate the maintenance state.

CapabilityInformation.description: Subscription-level properties and limits for Data Lake Analytics.

nameAvailable.description: The Boolean value of true or false to indicate whether the Data Lake Analytics account name is available or not.

reason.description: The reason why the Data Lake Analytics account name is not available, if nameAvailable is false.

message.description: The message describing why the Data Lake Analytics account name is not available, if nameAvailable is false.

NameAvailabilityInformation.description: Data Lake Analytics account name availability result information.

maxDegreeOfParallelismPerJob.description: The maximum degree of parallelism per job this user can use to submit jobs. This property, the min priority per job property, or both must be passed.

minPriorityPerJob.description: The minimum priority per job this user can use to submit jobs. This property, the max degree of parallelism per job property, or both must be passed.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

UpdateFirewallRuleProperties.description: The firewall rule properties to use when updating a firewall rule.

name.description: The Data Lake Analytics name to check availability for.

type.description: The resource type. Note: This should not be set by the user, as the constant value is Microsoft.DataLakeAnalytics/accounts

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Get subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

AccountNameParameter.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account.
